name: Astaroth's Circus: Ace of the Stage
name_original: Astaroth's Circus: Ace of the Stage
description:
This is (a very short) demo I have done  for my final project in class(in Spanish) There's barely no text and it's all instructions, here's the translation.

Exploration:

Movement: WASD/arrows.

Jump: Space bar.

Bus Stop: press B.

Gachapon: touch the machine, and the yellow center part.

In combat:

Dodge: A/D (move to the left and right respectively) you can only dodge while you are not attacking.

Enemy Attack: their attacks might hit you from the right or the left, pay attention to the animation.

Attack by clicking on the enemy.

There's a total of 27 combinations, try as many as you like. The in-game character and the portrait changes depending on which you create.

To exit the game, simply clickthe top left button.

There might be bugs, so commenting them is much appreciated!

Suggestions are more than welcome!

Enjoy the game!!

Credits:

3D city models by: PolygonSight https://polygonsight.itch.io/survival-city-lowpoly-pack

Original gahapon by: Socksblend https://skfb.ly/op8BS

Music by:

      -Pro Sensory https://opengameart.org/content/taking-you-to-the-circus

      - Bobjt https://opengameart.org/content/ring-master 

      -Aureolus_Omicron https://opengameart.org/content/4-music-box-tracks

      -Eric Matyas https://opengameart.org/content/windle-pixels-8-bit-circus
